Question: Swann Communications, Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Swann Communications, Inc.

Product Highlight: Swann unveils cutting-edge security products at CES 2024

- MaxRanger4K Longest Range Wireless Solar Security System with HaLow Wi-Fi technology, Sony STARVIS sensors, True Detect AI technology, sensor spotlights, and sirens
- Pan & Tilt 4K Wireless Security Camera with 4K Ultra HD video quality, True Detect AI technology, dual spotlights, Night2Day color night vision, and weatherproof design
- ActiveResponse Personal Safety Alarm with a loud 110-decibel siren, Bluetooth connectivity, and long-lasting CR2 battery
- HomeShield AI Security Voice Concierge for natural interactions, automatic responses to visitors, deliveries, and unfamiliar guests, and proactive deterrent services
- Upgrades to AllSecure4K+ Wireless Security Kit, SwannBuddy4K Wireless Video Doorbell, and Xtreem4K Wireless Camera with Spotlights
Summary_cn:
斯旺通信有限公司

产品亮点：斯旺在2024年国际消费电子展上推出尖端安全产品

- MaxRanger4K超长距离无线太阳能安全系统，配备HaLow Wi-Fi技术、索尼STARVIS传感器、True Detect人工智能技术、传感器聚光灯和警报器
- 全景&云台4K无线安全摄像头，具备4K超高清视频质量、True Detect人工智能技术、双聚光灯、Night2Day彩色夜视功能和防水设计
- ActiveResponse个人安全警报器，拥有110分贝的大声喇叭、蓝牙连接和持久的CR2电池
- HomeShield AI安全语音礼宾服务，可进行自然交互、自动响应访客、快递和陌生客人，并提供主动威慑服务
- 升级版的AllSecure4K+无线安全套件、SwannBuddy4K无线视频门铃和Xtreem4K带聚光灯的无线摄像头
